Although our warehouse is fully air-conditioned, these more fragile items are put in cold storage (freezer or refrigeration unit) for maximum freshness.Our receiving department does its best to verify and then enter the correct "Best By" dates for all incoming products. However, discrepancies do occur from time to time. This being said, the exceptionally high turnover at iHerb ensures that our inventory is among the freshest in the industry. For nearly 50 years we have been making trusted products, backed by science, and made with only the purest ingredients...guaranteed. So you can get the most out of life every day. Suggested use For adults, take one (1) caplet daily, preferably with a meal. Other ingredients Vegetable cellulose, calcium silicate. Contains <2% of: Vegetable magnesium stearate, vegetable stearic acid.Non-gmo, no artificial color, no artificial flavor, no artificial sweetener, no sugar, no starch, no milk, no lactose, no soy, no gluten, no wheat, no yeast, no fish. Sodium free.Made in the USA with select ingredients from around the world. Warnings If you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications or have any medical condition, consult your doctor before use. Discontinue use and consult your doctor if any adverse reactions occur. Keep out of reach of children. Store at room temperature. Do not use if seal under cap is broken or missing. Disclaimer While iHerb strives to ensure the accuracy of its product images and information, some manufacturing changes to packaging and/or ingredients may be pending update on our site. Although items may occasionally ship with alternate packaging, freshness is always guaranteed. We recommend that you read labels, warnings and directions of all products before use and not rely solely on the information provided by iHerb. Many users find the tablets easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach, with no side effects reported. The product is praised for its immune-boosting benefits, especially during cold seasons and changing weather. Long-term users have noticed improvements in their overall health, including skin and joint benefits. The packaging and shipping from iHerb are consistently reliable, with timely deliveries.
